name: Tomato Hurry Up
description:
It is basically a hard working tomato that’s trying to get to work in good conditions , actually our tomato have to avoid some enemies in order to be there at the right time, safe and red, because time and quality are the most important .

If not, it will be delivered as a toxic product and lose money and reputation which will lead to an economic crisis , but when doing it the right way the product will be qualified and the economy will grow .

Team :

Abdjlil Khelifi , BrahimBessrour , Ghaith hamdi , Safe Abidi
